trans-unit.source: An abstract adapter class for receiving print job events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as a convenience for creating listener objects. trans-unit.source: An abstract class to be extended by objects that represent metadata (non-image data) associated with images and streams.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象类,可由表示与图像和流相关的元数据(非图像数据)的对象扩展。

trans-unit.source: An abstract class to be extended by objects that represent metadata (non-image data) associated with images and streams. Plug-ins represent metadata using opaque, plug-in specific objects. These objects, however, provide the ability to access their internal information as a tree of IIOMetadataNode objects that support the XML DOM interfaces as well as additional interfaces for storing non-textual data and retrieving information about legal data values. The format of such trees is plug-in dependent, but plug-ins may choose to support a plug-in neutral format described below. A single plug-in may support multiple metadata formats, whose names maybe determined by calling getMetadataFormatNames. The plug-in may also support a single special format, referred to as the "native" format, which is designed to encode its metadata losslessly. This format will typically be designed specifically to work with a specific file format, so that images may be loaded and saved in the same format with no loss of metadata, but may be less useful for transferring metadata between an ImageReader and an ImageWriter for different image formats. To convert between two native formats as losslessly as the image file formats will allow, an ImageTranscoder object must be used.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象类，将由表示与图像和流关联的元数据（非图像数据）的对象扩展。插件使用不透明的插件特定对象表示元数据。但是，这些对象提供了以 IIOMetadataNode 对象树的形式访问其内部信息的能力，这些对象支持XML DOM接口以及用于存储非文本数据和检索有关合法数据值的信息的其他接口。这样的树的格式取决于插件，但是插件可以选择支持下面描述的插件非特定格式。单个插件可以支持多种元数据格式，其名称可以通过调用 getMetadataFormatNames 来确定。。插件还可以支持称为“本机”格式的单个特殊格式，该格式旨在无损地对其元数据进行编码。通常，此格式将专门设计为与特定文件格式配合使用，以便可以以相同的格式加载和保存图像而不会丢失元数据，但是对于在 ImageReader 和 ImageWriter 之间为不同的图像传输元数据可能不太有用。格式。要在两种本机格式之间进行尽可能无损的图像文件格式转换，必须使用 ImageTranscoder 对象。

trans-unit.target: 要转换为描述符字段的注解元素可以是Java语言允许的任何类型,但注解或注解数组除外。字段的值由注解元素的值导出,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: An annotation is present if it meets the definition of being present given in AnnotatedConstruct. In brief, an annotation is considered present for the purposes of discovery if it is directly present or present via inheritance. An annotation is not considered present by virtue of being wrapped by a container annotation. Operationally, this is equivalent to an annotation being present on an element if and only if it would be included in the results of Elements.getAllAnnotationMirrors(Element) called on that element. Since annotations inside container annotations are not considered present, to properly process repeatable annotation types, processors are advised to include both the repeatable annotation type and its containing annotation type in the set of supported annotation types of a processor.
trans-unit.target: 如果满足 AnnotatedConstruct 中给出的存在定义，则存在注释。简而言之，为了发现的目的，如果注释直接存在或通过继承存在，则认为该注释存在。由于容器注释包装了注释，因此认为注释不存在。从操作上讲，这等效于且仅当将在 Elements.getAllAnnotationMirrors(Element) 调用的Elements.getAllAnnotationMirrors（Element）的结果中包括该元素时，该元素上才存在一个注释。由于容器注释内的注释不存在，因此要正确处理可重复的注释类型，建议处理器在处理器支持的注释类型集中同时包含可重复注释类型及其包含的注释类型。

trans-unit.source: An annotation type is considered present if there is at least one annotation of that type present on an element enclosed within the root elements of a round. For this purpose, a type parameter is considered to be enclosed by its generic element. Annotations on type uses, as opposed to annotations on elements, are ignored when computing whether or not an annotation type is present.

trans-unit.source: An application can continuously monitor its memory usage by calling either the getUsage() method for all memory pools or the isUsageThresholdExceeded() method for those memory pools that support a usage threshold. Below is example code that has a thread dedicated for task distribution and processing. At every interval, it will determine if it should receive and process new tasks based on its memory usage. If the memory usage exceeds its usage threshold, it will redistribute all outstanding tasks to other VMs and stop receiving new tasks until the memory usage returns below its usage threshold.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以通过为所有内存池调用 getUsage() 方法或为那些支持使用率阈值的内存池 isUsageThresholdExceeded() 方法来连续监视其内存使用情况。以下是示例代码，该代码具有专用于任务分发和处理的线程。在每个时间间隔，它将根据其内存使用情况确定是否应接收和处理新任务。如果内存使用率超过其使用率阈值，它将将所有未完成的任务重新分配给其他VM，并停止接收新任务，直到内存使用率回到其使用率阈值以下。

trans-unit.source: An application can increase the capacity of an ArrayList instance before adding a large number of elements using the ensureCapacity operation. This may reduce the amount of incremental reallocation.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以通过使用 ensureCapacity 操作在添加大量元素之前增加 ArrayList 实例的容量。这可以减少增量重新分配的数量。

trans-unit.source: An application can monitor the instrumentation of the Java virtual machine and the runtime in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以通过以下方式监控Java虚拟机和运行时的仪表。

trans-unit.source: An application can use the method targetMustExist() to check whether a EventContext supports registration of nonexistent targets.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用 targetMustExist() 方法来检查 EventContext 是否支持不存在的目标的注册。

trans-unit.source: An application cannot create its own instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用程序不能创建自己的这个类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An application does not generally call the getContent method in this class directly. Instead, an application calls the getContent method in class URL or in URLConnection. The application's content handler factory (an instance of a class that implements the interface ContentHandlerFactory set up by a call to setContentHandler) is called with a String giving the MIME type of the object being received on the socket. The factory returns an instance of a subclass of ContentHandler, and its getContent method is called to create the object.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常不直接在此类中调用 getContent 方法。而是，应用程序在类 URL 或 URLConnection 中调用 getContent 方法。应用程序的内容处理程序工厂（通过调用 setContentHandler 来实现实现接口 ContentHandlerFactory 的类的实例）使用 String 调用，该String给出套接字上要接收的对象的MIME类型。工厂返回 ContentHandler 子类的实例，并调用其 getContent 方法创建对象。

trans-unit.source: An application implements a CallbackHandler and passes it to underlying security services so that they may interact with the application to retrieve specific authentication data, such as usernames and passwords, or to display certain information, such as error and warning messages.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序实现 CallbackHandler 并将其传递给基础安全服务，以便它们可以与应用程序交互以检索特定的身份验证数据（例如用户名和密码）或显示某些信息（例如错误和警告消息）。

trans-unit.source: An application invokes the static methods of the abstract class PrintServiceLookup to locate print services that have the capabilities to satisfy the application's print request. For example, to print a double-sided document, the application first needs to find printers that have the double-sided printing capability.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序调用抽象类 PrintServiceLookup 的静态方法来查找具有满足应用程序打印请求能力的打印服务。例如，要打印双面文档，应用程序首先需要查找具有双面打印功能的打印机。

trans-unit.source: An application is guaranteed that a read or write operation of up to the number of bytes returned from available() will not block; however, there is no guarantee that attempts to read or write more data will block.
trans-unit.target: 确保应用程序不会阻塞从 available() 返回的最大字节数的读取或写入操作；但是，不能保证读取或写入更多数据的尝试将被阻止。

trans-unit.source: An application may customize the contents of a registry as it sees fit, so long as it has the appropriate runtime permission.
trans-unit.target: 只要有适当的运行时权限,应用程序可以根据自己的需要定制注册表的内容。

trans-unit.source: An application may optionally pass in the flavor to be printed. If this is non-null choices presented to the user can be better validated against those supported by the services. An application must pass in a PrintRequestAttributeSet for returning user choices. On calling the PrintRequestAttributeSet may be empty, or may contain application-specified values.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以选择性地传递要打印的味道。如果这个是非空的,则可以更好地根据服务支持的选择来验证提供给用户的选择。应用程序必须传入PrintRequestAttributeSet来返回用户选择。在调用PrintRequestAttributeSet时,PrintRequestAttributeSet可以是空的,也可以包含应用程序指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An application may pass in a PrintService to be initially displayed. A non-null parameter must be included in the array of browsable services. If this parameter is null a service is chosen by the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以传递一个PrintService来进行初始显示。可浏览服务数组中必须包含一个非空参数。如果该参数为空,则会由实现者选择一个服务。

trans-unit.source: An application might use the activeCount method to get an estimate of how big the array should be, however
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可能使用activeCount方法来估计数组的大小，但是

trans-unit.source: An application might use the activeCount method to get an estimate of how big the array should be, however
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可能使用activeCount方法来估计数组的大小，但是

trans-unit.source: An application might use the activeGroupCount method to get an estimate of how big the array should be, however
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可能使用activeGroupCount方法来估计数组的大小，但是

trans-unit.source: An application must pass in an array of print services to browse. The array must be non-null and non-empty. Typically an application will pass in only PrintServices capable of printing a particular document flavor.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须传入一个要浏览的打印服务数组。该数组必须是非空的,且为非空。通常情况下,应用程序将只传入能够打印特定文档样式的 PrintServices。

trans-unit.source: An application opening a device explicitly with this call has to close the device by calling close(). This is necessary to release system resources and allow applications to exit cleanly.
trans-unit.target: 使用此调用显式打开设备的应用程序必须通过调用 close() 来关闭设备。这是释放系统资源并允许应用程序正常退出所必需的。

trans-unit.source: An application should catch instances of this class only if it must clean up after being terminated asynchronously. If ThreadDeath is caught by a method, it is important that it be rethrown so that the thread actually dies.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序只有在异步终止后必须清除的情况下，才应捕获此类的实例。如果 ThreadDeath 被某个方法捕获，则将其重新抛出以使线程实际死亡很重要。

trans-unit.source: An application should not normally try to catch ThreadDeath unless it must do some extraordinary cleanup operation (note that the throwing of ThreadDeath causes finally clauses of try statements to be executed before the thread officially dies). If a catch clause catches a ThreadDeath object, it is important to rethrow the object so that the thread actually dies.
trans-unit.target: 除非必须执行一些特殊的清除操作，否则应用程序通常不应尝试捕获 ThreadDeath （请注意，抛出 ThreadDeath 会导致 try 语句的 finally 子句在线程正式死亡之前被执行）。如果 catch 子句捕获了 ThreadDeath 对象，则重要的是重新抛出该对象，以便线程实际上死亡。

trans-unit.source: An application typically does not deal directly with these interfaces. Instead, it deals with classes that implement these interfaces. The application gets these classes either as part of a repertoire of extended operations standardized through the IETF, or from directory vendors for vendor-specific extended operations. The request classes should have constructors that accept arguments in a type-safe and user-friendly manner, while the response classes should have access methods for getting the data of the response in a type-safe and user-friendly manner. Internally, the request/response classes deal with encoding and decoding BER values.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常不直接处理这些接口。相反，它处理实现这些接口的类。应用程序将这些类作为通过IETF标准化的扩展操作的一部分，或从目录供应商处获取以特定于供应商的扩展操作。请求类应该具有以类型安全和用户友好的方式接受参数的构造函数，而响应类应该具有以类型安全和用户友好的方式获取响应数据的访问方法。在内部，请求/响应类处理BER值的编码和解码。

trans-unit.source: An application typically does not deal directly with this interface. Instead, it deals with classes that implement this interface. The application gets control classes either as part of a repertoire of controls standardized through the IETF, or from directory vendors for vendor-specific controls. The request control classes should have constructors that accept arguments in a type-safe and user-friendly manner, while the response control classes should have access methods for getting the data of the response in a type-safe and user-friendly manner. Internally, the request/response control classes deal with encoding and decoding BER values.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常不直接处理此接口。相反，它处理实现此接口的类。该应用程序可以通过IETF标准化控件集的一部分来获取控件类，也可以从目录供应商那里获得针对特定于控件的控件。请求控制类应具有以类型安全和用户友好的方式接受参数的构造函数，而响应控制类应具有用于以类型安全和用户友好的方式获取响应数据的访问方法。在内部，请求/响应控制类处理BER值的编码和解码。

trans-unit.target: 对应于返回的通知和它们所对应的听众的(Notification,listenerID)数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of Class objects to be returned from getInputTypes, initially null.
trans-unit.target: 从 getInputTypes 返回的 Class 对象的数组，最初为 null 。

trans-unit.source: An array of Class objects to be returned from getOutputTypes, initially null.
trans-unit.target: 从 getOutputTypes 返回的 Class 对象的数组，最初为 null 。

trans-unit.source: An array of File objects denoting the available filesystem roots, or null if the set of roots could not be determined. The array will be empty if there are no filesystem roots.
trans-unit.target: 表示可用文件系统根目录的 File 对象数组；如果无法确定根目录集，则为 null 。如果没有文件系统根，则该数组将为空。

trans-unit.source: An array of Locales that may be used to localize warning messages and compression setting values, or null if localization is not supported. By default it is initialized to null.

trans-unit.target: 一个 int 数组，指示将使用哪些源波段，或者为 null 。如果为 null ， setSourceBands 使用的源波段集如setSourceBands方法的注释中所述。任何值都不能为负。

trans-unit.source: An array of abstract pathnames denoting the files and directories in the directory denoted by this abstract pathname. The array will be empty if the directory is empty. Returns null if this abstract pathname does not denote a directory, or if an I/O error occurs.

trans-unit.source: An array of all locales for which this locale service provider can provide localized objects or names.
trans-unit.target: 该locale服务提供者可以提供本地化对象或名称的所有locale的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of attribute ids identifying the attributes that will be returned. Can be null.
trans-unit.target: 一个属性id的数组,用于标识将被返回的属性。可以是空值。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that was provided by the creator of the stream. Elements buf[0] through buf[count-1] are the only bytes that can ever be read from the stream; element buf[pos] is the next byte to be read.
trans-unit.target: 流的创建者提供的字节数组。元素 buf[0] 到 buf[count-1] 是唯一可以从流中读取的字节。元素 buf[pos] 是要读取的下一个字节。

trans-unit.source: An array of primitive type such as long[] can be represented directly as an Open Type. Thus, openType(long[]) is ArrayType.getPrimitiveArrayType(long[].class), and opendata(long[]) is long[].

trans-unit.target: 用于读写和操作文件的异步通道。

trans-unit.target: 一个异步通道,用于读取、写入和操作文件。

trans-unit.target: 一个面向流的连接套接字的异步通道。

trans-unit.target: 一个面向流的监听套接字的异步通道。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel group encapsulates the mechanics required to handle the completion of I/O operations initiated by asynchronous channels that are bound to the group. A group has an associated thread pool to which tasks are submitted to handle I/O events and dispatch to completion-handlers that consume the result of asynchronous operations performed on channels in the group. In addition to handling I/O events, the pooled threads may also execute other tasks required to support the execution of asynchronous I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: 异步通道组封装了处理由绑定到该组的 asynchronous channels 启动的I / O操作所需的机制。一个组具有一个关联的线程池，将任务提交给该线程池以处理I / O事件，并将其分配给使用在该组中的通道上执行异步操作的结果的 completion-handlers 。除了处理I / O事件外，池线程还可以执行支持异步I / O操作执行所需的其他任务。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel group is created by invoking the withFixedThreadPool or withCachedThreadPool methods defined here. Channels are bound to a group by specifying the group when constructing the channel. The associated thread pool is owned by the group; termination of the group results in the shutdown of the associated thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此处定义的 withFixedThreadPool 或 withCachedThreadPool 方法来创建异步通道组。通过在构造通道时指定组将通道绑定到组。关联的线程池归该组所有；组的终止将导致关联的线程池关闭。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel provider is a concrete subclass of this class that has a zero-argument constructor and implements the abstract methods specified below. A given invocation of the Java virtual machine maintains a single system-wide default provider instance, which is returned by the provider method. The first invocation of that method will locate the default provider as specified below.
trans-unit.target: 异步通道提供程序是此类的具体子类，它具有零参数构造函数并实现下面指定的抽象方法。Java虚拟机的给定调用将维护单个系统范围的默认提供程序实例，该实例由 provider 方法返回。该方法的第一次调用将找到默认提供者，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel that can read and write bytes.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以读写字节的异步通道。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel to a stream-oriented connecting socket
trans-unit.target: 一个通往面向流的连接套接字的异步通道。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel to a stream-oriented listening socket
trans-unit.target: 通往面向流的监听套接字的异步通道。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous file channel does not have a
trans-unit.target: 一个异步文件通道没有一个

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous file channel is created when a file is opened by invoking one of the open methods defined by this class. The file contains a variable-length sequence of bytes that can be read and written and whose current size can be queried. The size of the file increases when bytes are written beyond its current size; the size of the file decreases when it is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用由此类定义的 open 方法之一打开文件时，将创建一个异步文件通道。该文件包含一个可变长度的字节序列，可以读取和写入这些字节，并且可以 queried 其当前大小。当写入字节超过当前大小时，文件大小会增加；文件的大小在被 truncated 时会减小。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous server-socket channel is created by invoking the open method of this class. A newly-created asynchronous server-socket channel is open but not yet bound. It can be bound to a local address and configured to listen for connections by invoking the bind method. Once bound, the accept method is used to initiate the accepting of connections to the channel's socket. An attempt to invoke the accept method on an unbound channel will cause a NotYetBoundException to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 异步服务器套接字通道是通过调用此类的 open 方法创建的。新创建的异步服务器套接字通道已打开，但尚未绑定。它可以绑定到本地地址，并可以通过调用 bind 方法配置为侦听连接。绑定后， accept 方法用于启动对通道套接字的连接的接受。尝试在未绑定的通道上调用 accept 方法将导致引发 NotYetBoundException 。

trans-unit.source: An attached object may later be retrieved via the attachment method. Only one object may be attached at a time; invoking this method causes any previous attachment to be discarded. The current attachment may be discarded by attaching null.
trans-unit.target: 附加对象可以稍后通过 attachment 方法检索。一次只能附上一个物件；调用此方法将导致任何先前的附件被丢弃。通过附加 null 可以丢弃当前附件。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read up to
trans-unit.target: 试图读到

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read up to count bytes from the source channel and write them to this channel's file starting at the given position. An invocation of this method may or may not transfer all of the requested bytes; whether or not it does so depends upon the natures and states of the channels. Fewer than the requested number of bytes will be transferred if the source channel has fewer than count bytes remaining, or if the source channel is non-blocking and has fewer than count bytes immediately available in its input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 尝试从源通道读取 count 字节并将其从给定 position 开始写入该通道的文件。调用此方法可能会或可能不会传输所有请求的字节；是否这样做取决于渠道的性质和状态。如果源通道的剩余剩余字节数少于 count 字节，或者源通道是非阻塞的且输入缓冲区中立即可用的 count 字节数少于字节，则将传输少于请求的字节数。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read up to count bytes starting at the given position in this channel's file and write them to the target channel. An invocation of this method may or may not transfer all of the requested bytes; whether or not it does so depends upon the natures and states of the channels. Fewer than the requested number of bytes are transferred if this channel's file contains fewer than count bytes starting at the given position, or if the target channel is non-blocking and it has fewer than count bytes free in its output buffer.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取该通道文件中给定 position 处开始 count 字节，并将其写入目标通道。调用此方法可能会或可能不会传输所有请求的字节；是否这样做取决于渠道的性质和状态。如果此通道的文件包含少于给定 position count 字节，或者目标通道为非阻塞且输出缓冲区中的可用字节少于 count ，则传输的字节数少于请求的字节数。

trans-unit.source: An attribute A1 in matchingAttributes is considered to match an attribute A2 of an object if A1 and A2 have the same identifier, and each value of A1 is equal to some value of A2. This implies that the order of values is not significant, and that A2 may contain "extra" values not found in A1 without affecting the comparison. It also implies that if A1 has no values, then testing for a match is equivalent to testing for the presence of an attribute A2 with the same identifier.
trans-unit.target: 一个属性阿1中 matchingAttributes 中被认为是匹配的属性阿2的对象，如果阿1和阿2具有相同的标识符，并且每个值阿1等于某个值阿2。这意味着值的顺序并不重要，并且A 2可能包含在A 1中找不到的“多余”值，而不会影响比较。这也意味着如果A 1没有值，则测试匹配项等同于测试属性A的存在。2具有相同的标识符。

trans-unit.target: 属性值是一个小的原子数据项,如整数或枚举值。由于这些原因,Java打印服务API不使用原始数据类型(如int)来表示属性值。

trans-unit.source: An attribute view provides a read-only or updatable view of the non-opaque values, or metadata, associated with objects in a file system. The FileAttributeView interface is extended by several other interfaces that that views to specific sets of file attributes. FileAttributeViews are selected by invoking the Files.getFileAttributeView(java.nio.file.Path, java.lang.Class<V>, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) method with a type-token to identify the required view. Views can also be identified by name. The FileStoreAttributeView interface provides access to file store attributes. A FileStoreAttributeView of a given type is obtained by invoking the FileStore.getFileStoreAttributeView(java.lang.Class<V>) method.
trans-unit.target: 属性视图提供了与文件系统中的对象相关联的非透明值或元数据的只读或可更新视图。该 FileAttributeView 接口是由其他几个接口扩展是该意见的具体设置文件属性。通过调用带有类型令牌的 Files.getFileAttributeView(java.nio.file.Path, java.lang.Class<V>, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) 方法来选择所需的视图，从而选择 FileAttributeViews 。视图也可以通过名称标识。该 FileStoreAttributeView 接口提供了文件存储的属性访问。甲 FileStoreAttributeView 给定类型的通过调用获得 FileStore.getFileStoreAttributeView(java.lang.Class<V>) 方法。

trans-unit.source: An attribute view that is a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with a file in a filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 一个属性视图,是与文件系统中的文件相关联的非不透明值的只读或可更新视图。

trans-unit.source: An attribute view that is a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with a file in a filesystem. This interface is extended or implemented by specific file attribute views that define methods to read and/or update the attributes of a file.

trans-unit.source: An audio input stream is an input stream with a specified audio format and length.
trans-unit.target: 音频输入流是指具有指定音频格式和长度的输入流。

trans-unit.source: An audio input stream is an input stream with a specified audio format and length. The length is expressed in sample frames, not bytes. Several methods are provided for reading a certain number of bytes from the stream, or an unspecified number of bytes. The audio input stream keeps track of the last byte that was read. You can skip over an arbitrary number of bytes to get to a later position for reading. An audio input stream may support marks. When you set a mark, the current position is remembered so that you can return to it later.
trans-unit.target: 音频输入流是具有指定音频格式和长度的输入流。长度以采样帧表示,而不是以字节表示。有几种方法可以从流中读取一定数量的字节,或未指定数量的字节。音频输入流会跟踪读取的最后一个字节。你可以跳过任意数量的字节,以到达后面的位置进行读取。音频输入流可能支持标记。当您设置一个标记时,当前的位置会被记住,以便以后可以返回到它。

trans-unit.source: An editor object for the given target class. The result is null if no suitable editor can be found.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标类的编辑器对象。如果找不到合适的编辑器,结果为空。

trans-unit.source: An element in a stack trace, as returned by Throwable.getStackTrace().
trans-unit.target: 堆栈跟踪中的元素，由 Throwable.getStackTrace() 返回。

trans-unit.source: An element in a stack trace, as returned by Throwable.getStackTrace(). Each element represents a single stack frame. All stack frames except for the one at the top of the stack represent a method invocation. The frame at the top of the stack represents the execution point at which the stack trace was generated. Typically, this is the point at which the throwable corresponding to the stack trace was created.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈跟踪中的元素，由 Throwable.getStackTrace() 返回。每个元素代表一个堆栈框架。除堆栈顶部的所有框架外，所有其他框架均表示方法调用。堆栈顶部的框架表示生成堆栈跟踪的执行点。通常，这是创建与堆栈跟踪相对应的throwable的点。

trans-unit.source: An empty authority component is permitted as long as it is followed by a non-empty path, a query component, or a fragment component. This allows the parsing of URIs such as "file:///foo/bar", which seems to be the intent of RFC 2396 although the grammar does not permit it. If the authority component is empty then the user-information, host, and port components are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 允许为空的授权组件，只要它后面跟随非空路径，查询组件或片段组件即可。这允许解析诸如 "file:///foo/bar" 之类的URI，尽管语法不允许，但这似乎是RFC 2396的意图。如果授权组件为空，则用户信息，主机和端口组件未定义。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown while collecting information about the events. That is, when the listener receives a NamingExceptionEvent.

trans-unit.source: An exception may have suppressed exceptions while also being caused by another exception. Whether or not an exception has a cause is semantically known at the time of its creation, unlike whether or not an exception will suppress other exceptions which is typically only determined after an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一个异常可能有压制异常,同时也是由另一个异常引起的。一个异常是否有原因,在其产生时语义上是已知的,而不像一个异常是否会抑制其他异常,通常只有在异常被抛出后才能确定。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred during the introspection of an MBean.

trans-unit.source: An exception of type NumberFormatException is thrown if any of the following situations occurs:

trans-unit.source: An exception that indicates an X.509 certificate is revoked.

trans-unit.source: An exception that indicates an X.509 certificate is revoked. A CertificateRevokedException contains additional information about the revoked certificate, such as the date on which the certificate was revoked and the reason it was revoked.

trans-unit.source: An exception thrown when an error occurs during parsing.

trans-unit.source: An exception will be thrown if the application attempts to write more data than the indicated content-length, or if the application closes the OutputStream before writing the indicated amount.

trans-unit.source: An explicit close always closes the device, even if it also has been opened implicitly. A subsequent implicit close has no further effect.
trans-unit.target: 显式关闭总是关闭设备,即使它已经被隐式打开。随后的隐式关闭没有进一步的效果。

trans-unit.source: An expression whose value is oldInstance.
trans-unit.target: 一个值为 oldInstance 的表达式。

trans-unit.source: An extending class need only implement tryAdvance. The extending class should override forEach if it can provide a more performant implementation.

trans-unit.source: An external class calls the push method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 外部类显式调用 push 方法。

trans-unit.source: An hour is represented by an integer from 0 to 23. Thus, the hour from midnight to 1 a.m. is hour 0, and the hour from noon to 1 p.m. is hour 12.
trans-unit.target: 一个小时用0到23的整数来表示,因此,从午夜到凌晨1点是0小时,从中午到下午1点是12小时。因此,从午夜到凌晨1点的时间是0小时,从中午到下午1点的时间是12小时。

trans-unit.source: An ideal trySplit method efficiently (without traversal) divides its elements exactly in half, allowing balanced parallel computation. Many departures from this ideal remain highly effective; for example, only approximately splitting an approximately balanced tree, or for a tree in which leaf nodes may contain either one or two elements, failing to further split these nodes. However, large deviations in balance and/or overly inefficient trySplit mechanics typically result in poor parallel performance.
trans-unit.target: 理想的 trySplit 方法可以有效地（无遍历）将其元素精确地分成两半，从而实现平衡的并行计算。许多偏离这一理想的做法仍然非常有效。例如，仅对近似平衡的树进行近似拆分，或者对于其中叶节点可能包含一个或两个元素的树，无法进一步拆分这些节点。但是，平衡的大偏差和/或 trySplit 力学效率过低通常会导致较差的并行性能。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for a set of interfaces (typically belonging to different nodes). A packet sent to a multicast address is delivered to all interfaces identified by that address.
trans-unit.target: 一组接口(通常属于不同节点)的标识符。发送到一个多播地址的数据包会被送到该地址所标识的所有接口。

trans-unit.source: An image encoded as part of a file or stream may be thought of extending out in multiple dimensions: the spatial dimensions of width and height, a number of bands, and a number of progressive decoding passes. This class allows a contiguous (hyper)rectangular subarea of the image in all of these dimensions to be selected for decoding. Additionally, the spatial dimensions may be subsampled discontinuously. Finally, color and format conversions may be specified by controlling the ColorModel and SampleModel of the destination image, either by providing a BufferedImage or by using an ImageTypeSpecifier.
trans-unit.target: 可以将编码为文件或流的一部分的图像视为在多个维度上扩展：宽度和高度的空间维度，多个波段以及多个渐进式解码遍历。此类允许选择所有这些维度的图像的连续（超）矩形子区域进行解码。另外，空间尺寸可以不连续地被子采样。最后，可以通过控制目标图像的 ColorModel 和 SampleModel 来指定颜色和格式转换，方法是提供 BufferedImage 或使用 ImageTypeSpecifier 。

trans-unit.source: An immutable sequence of characters. When created by the same implementation, objects implementing this interface must obey the general equals contract when compared with each other. Therefore, Name objects from the same implementation are usable in collections while Names from different implementations may not work properly in collections.

trans-unit.target: 从标准字符集名称到字符集对象的不可改变的、不区分大小写的映射。

trans-unit.source: An implementation allows this socket option to be set before the socket is bound or connected. Changing the value of this socket option after the socket is bound has no effect. The default value of this socket option is system dependent.
trans-unit.target: 一个实施例允许在套接字被绑定或连接之前设置这个套接字选项。在套接字绑定后改变这个套接字选项的值没有任何影响。该套接字选项的默认值取决于系统。

trans-unit.source: An implementation can favor responding to an interrupt over normal method return in response to a signal, or over indicating the elapse of the specified waiting time. trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageOutputStream that writes its output to a regular OutputStream. A memory buffer is used to cache at least the data between the discard position and the current write position. The only constructor takes an OutputStream, so this class may not be used for read/modify/write operations. Reading can occur only on parts of the stream that have already been written to the cache and not yet flushed.
trans-unit.target: ImageOutputStream 的实现，将其输出写入常规的 OutputStream 。存储器缓冲器用于至少在丢弃位置和当前写入位置之间缓存数据。唯一的构造方法使用 OutputStream ，因此此类不能用于读取/修改/写入操作。只能在流中已被写入高速缓存但尚未刷新的部分上进行读取。

trans-unit.source: An important method that must be implemented by each subclass is the implies method to compare Permissions. Basically, "permission p1 implies permission p2" means that if one is granted permission p1, one is naturally granted permission p2. Thus, this is not an equality test, but rather more of a subset test.
trans-unit.target: 每个子类必须实现的一个重要方法是 implies 方法来比较权限。基本上，“权限p1意味着权限p2”是指，如果授予了权限p1，则自然是授予了权限p2。因此，这不是一个相等性测试，而是更多的子集测试。

trans-unit.source: An important property of the directory stream's Iterator is that its hasNext method is guaranteed to read-ahead by at least one element. If hasNext method returns true, and is followed by a call to the next method, it is guaranteed that the next method will not throw an exception due to an I/O error, or because the stream has been closed. The Iterator does not support the remove operation.
trans-unit.target: 目录流的 Iterator 的一个重要属性是，保证其 hasNext 方法至少可以预读一个元素。如果 hasNext 方法返回 true ，并随后调用 next 方法，则可以确保 next 方法不会由于I / O错误或流已 closed 而引发异常。该 Iterator 不支持 remove 操作。

trans-unit.source: An instance of J is reconstructed by calling a constructor with the appropriate reconstructed items from the CompositeData. The constructor to be called will be determined at runtime based on the items actually present in the CompositeData, given that this CompositeData might come from an earlier version of J where not all the items were present. A constructor is applicable if all the properties named in its ConstructorProperties annotation are present as items in the CompositeData. If no constructor is applicable, then the attempt to reconstruct J fails.
trans-unit.target: 通过从 CompositeData 调用带有适当的重构项的构造函数来重构J的实例。假定此 CompositeData 可能来自J的早期版本，而并非所有项都存在，则将在运行时根据 CompositeData 中实际存在的项确定要调用的构造函数。如果在其 ConstructorProperties 批注中命名的所有属性都在 CompositeData 中作为项目出现，则构造器适用。如果没有适用的构造函数，则重建J的尝试将失败。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the URL class, by contrast, represents the syntactic components of a URL together with some of the information required to access the resource that it describes. A URL must be absolute, that is, it must always specify a scheme. A URL string is parsed according to its scheme. A stream handler is always established for a URL, and in fact it is impossible to create a URL instance for a scheme for which no handler is available. Equality and hashing depend upon both the scheme and the Internet address of the host, if any; comparison is not defined. In other words, a URL is a structured string that supports the syntactic operation of resolution as well as the network I/O operations of looking up the host and opening a connection to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下， URL 类的实例代表URL的语法组件以及访问其描述的资源所需的一些信息。 URL必须是绝对的，也就是说，它必须始终指定一个方案。 URL字符串将根据其方案进行解析。始终为URL建立流处理程序，实际上，不可能为没有可用处理程序的方案创建URL实例。平等和哈希取决于方案和主机的Internet地址（如果有）；未定义比较。换句话说，URL是一种结构化的字符串，它支持解析的语法操作以及查找主机并打开与指定资源的连接的网络I / O操作。

The reset() method will reset the value of the scanner's locale to the initial locale regardless of whether it was previously changed.

trans-unit.target: 该类的一个实例用于生成伪随机数流。该类使用一个48位的种子,使用线性同余公式对其进行修改。(参见Donald Knuth,

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class represents a URI reference in the syntactic sense defined by RFC 2396. A URI may be either absolute or relative. A URI string is parsed according to the generic syntax without regard to the scheme, if any, that it specifies. No lookup of the host, if any, is performed, and no scheme-dependent stream handler is constructed. Equality, hashing, and comparison are defined strictly in terms of the character content of the instance. In other words, a URI instance is little more than a structured string that supports the syntactic, scheme-independent operations of comparison, normalization, resolution, and relativization.
trans-unit.target: 该类的一个实例代表RFC 2396所定义的语法意义上的URI引用。一个URI可以是绝对的或相对的。URI字符串根据通用语法进行解析,而不考虑它所指定的方案(如果有的话)。不执行主机的查找(如果有的话),也不构建依赖于方案的流处理程序。等价、散列和比较是严格按照实例的字符内容来定义的。换句话说,URI实例只不过是一个结构化的字符串,它支持比较、归一化、解析和相对化这些与语法、方案无关的操作。

trans-unit.source: An instrument is a sound-synthesis algorithm with certain parameter settings, usually designed to emulate a specific real-world musical instrument or to achieve a specific sort of sound effect.

trans-unit.source: An instrument is a sound-synthesis algorithm with certain parameter settings, usually designed to emulate a specific real-world musical instrument or to achieve a specific sort of sound effect. Instruments are typically stored in collections called soundbanks. Before the instrument can be used to play notes, it must first be loaded onto a synthesizer, and then it must be selected for use on one or more channels, via a program-change command. MIDI notes that are subsequently received on those channels will be played using the sound of the selected instrument.
trans-unit.target: 乐器是一种具有一定参数设置的声音合成算法,通常是为了模拟特定的现实世界中的乐器或达到特定的声音效果。乐器通常存储在称为声库的集合中。在使用乐器演奏音符之前,必须先将其加载到合成器上,然后通过程序更改命令将其选择在一个或多个通道上使用。随后在这些通道上接收到的MIDI音符将用所选乐器的声音来演奏。

trans-unit.source: An interpreter for printf-style format strings. This class provides support for layout justification and alignment, common formats for numeric, string, and date/time data, and locale-specific output. Common Java types such as byte, BigDecimal, and Calendar are supported. Limited formatting customization for arbitrary user types is provided through the Formattable interface.

trans-unit.source: An invocation of the hashCode, equals, or toString methods declared in java.lang.Object on a proxy instance will be encoded and dispatched to the invocation handler's invoke method in the same manner as interface method invocations are encoded and dispatched, as described above. The declaring class of the Method object passed to invoke will be java.lang.Object. Other public methods of a proxy instance inherited from java.lang.Object are not overridden by a proxy class, so invocations of those methods behave like they do for instances of java.lang.Object.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，将对代理实例上 java.lang.Object 中声明的 hashCode ， equals 或 toString 方法的调用进行编码，然后将其分配给调用处理程序的 invoke 方法，就像对接口方法的调用进行编码和分配一样。传递给 invoke 的 Method 对象的声明类将是 java.lang.Object 。从 java.lang.Object 继承的代理实例的其他公共方法不会被代理类覆盖，因此对这些方法的调用的行为就像对 java.lang.Object 实例的调用一样。

trans-unit.target: 迭代器

trans-unit.target: 列表的迭代器，允许程序员在任一方向上遍历列表，在迭代过程中修改列表，并获取迭代器在列表中的当前位置。甲 ListIterator 没有当前元素; 它的

trans-unit.source: An iterator over a collection. Iterator takes the place of Enumeration in the Java Collections Framework. Iterators differ from enumerations in two ways:
trans-unit.target: 集合上的迭代器。在Java Collections Framework中， Iterator 代替了 Enumeration 。迭代器与枚举有以下两种不同：

trans-unit.source: An iterator providing access to the text and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: 一个迭代器,提供对文本及其属性的访问。

trans-unit.source: An iterator that lazily loads providers for this loader's service
trans-unit.target: 一个迭代器,为这个加载器的服务懒惰地加载提供者。

trans-unit.source: An object can be registered to listen to multiple lines. The event it receives in its update method will specify which line created the event, what type of event it was (OPEN, CLOSE, START, or STOP), and how many sample frames the line had processed at the time the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 可以注册一个对象以收听多行。它在其 update 方法中接收到的事件将指定创建事件的行，事件的类型（ OPEN ， CLOSE ， START 或 STOP ）以及事件发生时该行处理了多少个样本帧。

trans-unit.source: An object created using refInfo and attrs; or refInfo if an object cannot be created by a factory.
trans-unit.target: 使用 refInfo 和 attrs 创建的对象；或 refInfo (如果工厂无法创建对象）。

trans-unit.source: An object created using refInfo; or refInfo if an object cannot be created using the algorithm described above.
trans-unit.target: 使用 refInfo 创建的对象；或 refInfo 如果对象不能使用上面描述的算法创建。

trans-unit.source: An object describing the structure of metadata documents returned from IIOMetadata.getAsTree and passed to IIOMetadata.setFromTree and mergeTree.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，描述从 IIOMetadata.getAsTree 返回并传递给 IIOMetadata.setFromTree 和 mergeTree 的元数据文档的结构。

trans-unit.source: An object describing the structure of metadata documents returned from IIOMetadata.getAsTree and passed to IIOMetadata.setFromTree and mergeTree. Document structures are described by a set of constraints on the type and number of child elements that may belong to a given parent element type, the names, types, and values of attributes that may belong to an element, and the type and values of Object reference that may be stored at a node.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，描述从 IIOMetadata.getAsTree 返回并传递给 IIOMetadata.setFromTree 和 mergeTree 的元数据文档的结构。通过对可能属于给定父元素类型的子元素的类型和数量，可能属于某个元素的属性的名称，类型和值以及 Object 的类型和值的一组约束来描述文档结构可以存储在节点上的引用。

trans-unit.source: An object factory must implement the ObjectFactory interface. In addition, the factory class must be public and must have a public constructor that accepts no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 对象工厂必须实现 ObjectFactory 接口。此外，工厂类必须是公共的，并且必须具有不接受任何参数的公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An object for traversing and partitioning elements of a source.
trans-unit.target: 用于遍历和分割源元素的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object for traversing and partitioning elements of a source. The source of elements covered by a Spliterator could be, for example, an array, a Collection, an IO channel, or a generator function.
trans-unit.target: 用于遍历和划分源元素的对象。分隔符覆盖的元素的来源可以是例如数组， Collection ，IO通道或生成器函数。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing this interface might not have an address at a given moment. This is indicated by a null return value from getAddress().
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的对象在给定时刻可能没有地址。这由 getAddress() 的空返回值指示。

trans-unit.source: An object name
trans-unit.target: 对象名称

trans-unit.source: An object name consists of two parts, the domain and the key properties.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象名由域和键属性两部分组成。

trans-unit.source: An object name is a pattern if its domain contains a wildcard or if the object name is a property pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象名的域包含通配符,或者对象名是属性模式,那么对象名就是一个模式。

trans-unit.source: An object name is a pattern on the key properties if it is a pattern on the key property list (e.g. "d:k=v,*") or on the property values (e.g. "d:k=*") or on both (e.g. "d:k=*,*").
trans-unit.target: 如果一个对象名称是关键属性上的模式,那么它就是关键属性列表上的模式(如 "d:k=v,*")或属性值上的模式(如 "d:k=*")或两者都是(如 "d:k=*,*")。

trans-unit.source: An object name pattern, within the context of a query
trans-unit.target: 一个对象名称模式,在一个查询的范围内

trans-unit.source: An object obtained from the createMBeanServer or newMBeanServer methods of the MBeanServerFactory class applies security checks to its methods, as follows.
trans-unit.target: 从 MBeanServerFactory 类的 createMBeanServer 或 newMBeanServer 方法获得的对象将安全性检查应用于其方法，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: An object of this class implements the MBeanServer interface and wraps another object that also implements that interface.
trans-unit.target: 该类的一个对象实现了MBeanServer接口,并封装了另一个同样实现该接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object of this class implements the MBeanServer interface and wraps another object that also implements that interface. Typically, an implementation of this interface performs some action in some or all methods of the MBeanServer interface before and/or after forwarding the method to the wrapped object. Examples include security checking and logging.
trans-unit.target: 此类的对象实现MBeanServer接口，并包装另一个也实现该接口的对象。通常，在将方法转发到包装的对象之前和/或之后，此接口的实现会在 MBeanServer 接口的某些或所有方法中执行某些操作。示例包括安全检查和日志记录。

trans-unit.source: An object of this interface is not required to support multi-threaded access, that is, be synchronized. However, it must support concurrent access to different file objects created by this object.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口的对象不需要支持多线程访问,也就是同步。但是,它必须支持对该对象创建的不同文件对象的并发访问。

trans-unit.source: An object reference that may be updated atomically.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以原子化更新的对象引用。

trans-unit.source: An object reference that may be updated atomically. See the java.util.concurrent.atomic package specification for description of the properties of atomic variables.
trans-unit.target: 可以原子更新的对象引用。有关原子变量的属性的描述，请参见 java.util.concurrent.atomic 包规范。

trans-unit.source: An object that configures how to copy or move a file.
trans-unit.target: 配置如何复制或移动文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that configures how to open or create a file.
trans-unit.target: 一个配置如何打开或创建文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that creates new threads on demand.
trans-unit.target: 一个根据需求创建新线程的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that creates new threads on demand. Using thread factories removes hardwiring of calls to new Thread, enabling applications to use special thread subclasses, priorities, etc.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要创建新线程的对象。使用线程工厂可以消除对 new Thread 的调用的繁琐工作，从而使应用程序可以使用特殊的线程子类，优先级等。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates the value of a file attribute that can be set atomically when creating a new file or directory by invoking the createFile or createDirectory methods.
trans-unit.target: 封装文件属性值的对象，当通过调用 createFile 或 createDirectory 方法创建新文件或目录时，可以原子设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that executes submitted Runnable tasks.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，执行已提交 Runnable 任务。

trans-unit.source: An object that executes submitted Runnable tasks. This interface provides a way of decoupling task submission from the mechanics of how each task will be run, including details of thread use, scheduling, etc. An Executor is normally used instead of explicitly creating threads. For example, rather than invoking new Thread(new(RunnableTask())).start() for each of a set of tasks, you might use:
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，执行已提交 Runnable 任务。此接口提供了一种将任务提交与每个任务的运行机制（包括线程使用，调度的详细信息）分离的方法。通常使用 Executor 程序来代替显式创建线程。例如，可以为每个任务集调用 new Thread(new(RunnableTask())).start() 而不是：

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the Enumeration interface generates a series of elements, one at a time.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现Enumeration接口的对象会产生一系列的元素,一次一个。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the Enumeration interface generates a series of elements, one at a time. Successive calls to the nextElement method return successive elements of the series.
trans-unit.target: 实现Enumeration接口的对象会生成一系列元素，一次生成一个。连续调用 nextElement 方法将返回该系列的连续元素。

trans-unit.source: An object that maps keys to values.
trans-unit.target: 一个将键映射到值的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that maps keys to values. A map cannot contain duplicate keys; each key can map to at most one value.
trans-unit.target: 一个将键映射到值的对象。一个映射不能包含重复的键,每个键最多只能映射到一个值。

trans-unit.source: An object that may be registered with a watch service so that it can be watched for changes and events.
trans-unit.target: 可以在监视服务中注册的对象，以便可以监视其更改和事件。

trans-unit.source: An object that may be used to locate a file in a file system.
trans-unit.target: 可用于定位文件系统中的文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that may be used to locate a file in a file system. It will typically represent a system dependent file path.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于定位文件系统中的文件的对象。它通常代表一个依赖于系统的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: An object that may hold resources (such as file or socket handles) until it is closed.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以保留资源(如文件或套接字句柄)的对象,直到它被关闭。

trans-unit.source: An object that may hold resources (such as file or socket handles) until it is closed. The close() method of an AutoCloseable object is called automatically when exiting a try-with-resources block for which the object has been declared in the resource specification header. This construction ensures prompt release, avoiding resource exhaustion exceptions and errors that may otherwise occur.
trans-unit.target: 在关闭之前可以保存资源（例如文件或套接字句柄）的对象。当退出 try -with-resources块（已在资源规范头中为其声明对象）时，将自动调用 AutoCloseable 对象的 close() 方法。这种构造可确保及时释放，避免资源耗尽异常和可能发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with an object in a filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 提供与文件系统中的对象关联的非不透明值的只读或可更新视图的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with an object in a filesystem. This interface is extended or implemented by specific attribute views that define the attributes supported by the view. A specific attribute view will typically define type-safe methods to read or update the attributes that it supports.
trans-unit.target: 提供与文件系统中的对象关联的非不透明值的只读或可更新视图的对象。此接口由定义该视图支持的属性的特定属性视图扩展或实现。特定的属性视图通常将定义类型安全的方法，以读取或更新其支持的属性。

trans-unit.source: An object to iterate over the backing file stores
trans-unit.target: 遍历备份文件存储的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to iterate over the entries in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象,用于遍历目录中的条目。

trans-unit.source: An object to iterate over the entries in a directory. A directory stream allows for the convenient use of the for-each construct to iterate over a directory.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于遍历目录中的条目的对象。目录流允许方便地使用for-each结构来遍历一个目录。

trans-unit.source: An object to iterate over the root directories
trans-unit.target: 一个用于遍历根目录的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to lookup user and group principals by name.
trans-unit.target: 用于按名称查找用户和组负责人的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to lookup user and group principals by name. A UserPrincipal represents an identity that may be used to determine access rights to objects in a file system. A GroupPrincipal represents a group identity. A UserPrincipalLookupService defines methods to lookup identities by name or group name (which are typically user or account names). Whether names and group names are case sensitive or not depends on the implementation. The exact definition of a group is implementation specific but typically a group represents an identity created for administrative purposes so as to determine the access rights for the members of the group. In particular it is implementation specific if the namespace for names and groups is the same or is distinct. To ensure consistent and correct behavior across platforms it is recommended that this API be used as if the namespaces are distinct. In other words, the lookupPrincipalByName should be used to lookup users, and lookupPrincipalByGroupName should be used to lookup groups.
trans-unit.target: 用于按名称查找用户和组主体的对象。甲 UserPrincipal 表示可被用来确定在一个文件系统对象的访问权的标识。甲 GroupPrincipal 表示组标识。甲 UserPrincipalLookupService 定义了方法查找通过名称或组名称标识（其通常是用户或帐户名）。名称和组名称是否区分大小写取决于实现。组的确切定义是特定于实现的，但通常，组代表为管理目的而创建的身份，以便确定组成员的访问权限。特别是名称空间是特定于实现的名称和组相同或不同。为了确保跨平台的行为一致且正确，建议像命名空间一样使用此API。换句话说， lookupPrincipalByName 应该用于查找用户，而 lookupPrincipalByGroupName 应该用于查找组。

trans-unit.source: An object to which char sequences and values can be appended.

trans-unit.source: An optionally-bounded blocking deque based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的可选绑定的双端队列。

trans-unit.source: An optionally-bounded blocking queue based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的可选绑定的阻塞队列。

trans-unit.source: An optionally-bounded blocking queue based on linked nodes. This queue orders elements FIFO (first-in-first-out). The head of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the longest time. The tail of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the shortest time. New elements are inserted at the tail of the queue, and the queue retrieval operations obtain elements at the head of the queue. Linked queues typically have higher throughput than array-based queues but less predictable performance in most concurrent applications.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的可选绑定的阻塞队列。此队列对元素FIFO（先进先出）进行排序。队列的开头是已在队列中停留最长时间的元素。队列的尾部是最短时间出现在队列中的元素。新元素插入到队列的尾部，并且队列检索操作在队列的开头获取元素。链接队列通常比基于阵列的队列具有更高的吞吐量，但是在大多数并发应用程序中，可预测的性能较差。

trans-unit.target: 一个有序的集合(也称为

trans-unit.source: An output stream that also maintains a checksum of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 一个输出流,也维护着被写入数据的校验和。

trans-unit.source: An output stream that also maintains a checksum of the data being written. The checksum can then be used to verify the integrity of the output data.
trans-unit.target: 一个输出流,它还维护着所写数据的校验和。然后,可利用该校验和来验证输出数据的完整性。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded blocking queue of Delayed elements, in which an element can only be taken when its delay has expired.
trans-unit.target: Delayed 元素的无限制阻塞队列，在该队列中，只有在其延迟到期时才可以使用该元素。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded blocking queue of Delayed elements, in which an element can only be taken when its delay has expired. The head of the queue is that Delayed element whose delay expired furthest in the past. If no delay has expired there is no head and poll will return null. Expiration occurs when an element's getDelay(TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS) method returns a value less than or equal to zero. Even though unexpired elements cannot be removed using take or poll, they are otherwise treated as normal elements. For example, the size method returns the count of both expired and unexpired elements. This queue does not permit null elements.
trans-unit.target: Delayed 元素的无限制阻塞队列，在该队列中，只有在其延迟到期时才可以使用该元素。队列的开头是该 Delayed 元素，其延迟在过去最远时过期。如果没有延迟，则没有头，并且 poll 将返回 null 。当元素的 getDelay(TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS) 方法返回的值小于或等于零时，就会发生过期。即使无法使用 take 或 poll 删除未过期的元素，也将它们视为普通元素。例如 size 方法返回过期和未过期元素的计数。此队列不允许空元素。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded blocking queue that uses the same ordering rules as class PriorityQueue and supplies blocking retrieval operations.
trans-unit.target: 一个无界阻塞队列，它使用与类 PriorityQueue 相同的排序规则，并提供阻塞检索操作。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded blocking queue that uses the same ordering rules as class PriorityQueue and supplies blocking retrieval operations. While this queue is logically unbounded, attempted additions may fail due to resource exhaustion (causing OutOfMemoryError). This class does not permit null elements. A priority queue relying on natural ordering also does not permit insertion of non-comparable objects (doing so results in ClassCastException).
trans-unit.target: 一个无界阻塞队列，它使用与类 PriorityQueue 相同的排序规则，并提供阻塞检索操作。尽管此队列在逻辑上是不受限制的，但是尝试尝试添加可能会由于资源耗尽而失败（导致 OutOfMemoryError ）。此类不允许使用 null 元素。依赖自然顺序的优先级队列也不允许插入不可比较的对象（这样做会导致 ClassCastException ）。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded TransferQueue based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无界 TransferQueue 。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded TransferQueue based on linked nodes. This queue orders elements FIFO (first-in-first-out) with respect to any given producer. The head of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the longest time for some producer. The tail of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the shortest time for some producer.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无界 TransferQueue 。此队列针对任何给定的生产者对元素FIFO（先进先出）进行排序。队列的开头是某个生产者在队列中停留时间最长的元素。队列的尾部是某个生产者在最短时间内进入队列的元素。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded concurrent deque based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无限制并发双端队列。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded concurrent deque based on linked nodes. Concurrent insertion, removal, and access operations execute safely across multiple threads. A ConcurrentLinkedDeque is an appropriate choice when many threads will share access to a common collection. Like most other concurrent collection implementations, this class does not permit the use of null elements.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无限制并发双端队列。并发插入，删除和访问操作可在多个线程之间安全地执行。一个 ConcurrentLinkedDeque 是当许多线程共享访问一个共同的集合一个合适的选择。与大多数其他并发集合实现一样，此类不允许使用 null 元素。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded priority queue based on a priority heap.
trans-unit.target: 基于优先级堆的无界优先级队列。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded priority queue based on a priority heap. The elements of the priority queue are ordered according to their natural ordering, or by a Comparator provided at queue construction time, depending on which constructor is used. A priority queue does not permit null elements. A priority queue relying on natural ordering also does not permit insertion of non-comparable objects (doing so may result in ClassCastException).
trans-unit.target: 基于优先级堆的无界优先级队列。优先级队列的元素根据其自然顺序进行排序，或者由队列构造时提供的 Comparator 进行排序，具体取决于所使用的构造函数。优先级队列不允许 null 元素。依赖自然顺序的优先级队列也不允许插入不可比较的对象（这样做可能会导致 ClassCastException ）。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded thread-safe queue based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无界线程安全队列。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded thread-safe queue based on linked nodes. This queue orders elements FIFO (first-in-first-out). The head of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the longest time. The tail of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the shortest time. New elements are inserted at the tail of the queue, and the queue retrieval operations obtain elements at the head of the queue. A ConcurrentLinkedQueue is an appropriate choice when many threads will share access to a common collection. Like most other concurrent collection implementations, this class does not permit the use of null elements.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无界线程安全队列。该队列对元素FIFO（先进先出）进行排序。队列的开头是已在队列中停留最长时间的元素。队列的尾部是最短时间出现在队列中的元素。新元素插入到队列的尾部，并且队列检索操作在队列的开头获取元素。一 ConcurrentLinkedQueue 是当许多线程共享访问一个共同的集合一个合适的选择。与大多数其他并发集合实现一样，此类不允许使用 null 元素。

trans-unit.source: Annotation processing happens in a sequence of rounds. On each round, a processor may be asked to process a subset of the annotations found on the source and class files produced by a prior round. The inputs to the first round of processing are the initial inputs to a run of the tool; these initial inputs can be regarded as the output of a virtual zeroth round of processing. If a processor was asked to process on a given round, it will be asked to process on subsequent rounds, including the last round, even if there are no annotations for it to process. The tool infrastructure may also ask a processor to process files generated implicitly by the tool's operation.
trans-unit.target: 批注处理是按一系列回合进行的。在每一轮中，可能会要求处理器处理在上一轮产生的源文件和类文件中找到的注释的子集。第一轮处理的输入是工具运行的初始输入。这些初始输入可以视为虚拟第零轮处理的输出。如果要求处理器在给定的回合中进行处理，即使没有注释要处理，也将要求其在后续回合中进行处理，包括最后一轮。工具基础结构还可能要求处理器处理由工具操作隐式生成的文件。

trans-unit.source: Another typical usage would be to divide a problem into N parts, describe each part with a Runnable that executes that portion and counts down on the latch, and queue all the Runnables to an Executor. trans-unit.source: Any attempt to read object data which exceeds the boundaries of the custom data written by the corresponding writeObject method will cause an OptionalDataException to be thrown with an eof field value of true. Non-object reads which exceed the end of the allotted data will reflect the end of data in the same way that they would indicate the end of the stream: bytewise reads will return -1 as the byte read or number of bytes read, and primitive reads will throw EOFExceptions. If there is no corresponding writeObject method, then the end of default serialized data marks the end of the allotted data.
trans-unit.target: 任何试图读取对象数据的行为,如果超过了对应的writeObject方法所写入的自定义数据的边界,都会导致抛出一个eof字段值为true的 OptionalDataException。超出分配数据结束的非对象读取将以同样的方式反映数据流的结束:按字节读取将返回-1作为读取的字节或字节数,基元读取将抛出eofExceptions。如果没有相应的writeObject方法,那么默认序列化数据的结束标志着分配数据的结束。

trans-unit.target: 任何未设置（或设置为 null ）的参数将被设置为该参数的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Any parameter that is not set (or is set to null) will be set to the default value for that parameter. The default value for the date parameter is null, which indicates the current time when the path is validated. The default for the remaining parameters is the least constrained.
trans-unit.target: 任何未设置（或设置为 null ）的参数将被设置为该参数的默认值。 date 参数的默认值为 null ，它表示验证路径的当前时间。其余参数的默认约束最少。

trans-unit.source: Any registered IIOReadProgressListener objects will be notified by calling their imageStarted method, followed by calls to their imageProgress method as the read progresses. Finally their imageComplete method will be called. IIOReadUpdateListener objects may be updated at other times during the read as pixels are decoded. Finally, IIOReadWarningListener objects will receive notification of any non-fatal warnings that occur during decoding.
trans-unit.target: 任何注册 IIOReadProgressListener 对象将通过调用它们的通知 imageStarted 方法，然后通过调用其 imageProgress 中的方法读取进展。最后，将调用他们的 imageComplete 方法。 IIOReadUpdateListener 对象可能在读取过程中的其他时间更新，因为像素已解码。最后， IIOReadWarningListener 对象将接收有关在解码期间发生的任何非致命警告的通知。

trans-unit.source: Any registered IIOReadProgressListener objects will be notified by calling their sequenceStarted method once. Then, for each image decoded, there will be a call to imageStarted, followed by calls to imageProgress as the read progresses, and finally to imageComplete. The sequenceComplete method will be called after the last image has been decoded. IIOReadUpdateListener objects may be updated at other times during the read as pixels are decoded. Finally, IIOReadWarningListener objects will receive notification of any non-fatal warnings that occur during decoding.
trans-unit.target: 任何已注册的 IIOReadProgressListener 对象都将通过调用它们的 sequenceStarted 方法来得到通知。然后，对于每个图像的解码，将有一个呼叫 imageStarted ，然后调用 imageProgress 中作为读取进展，最后到 imageComplete 。该 sequenceComplete 最后的图像已被解码后的方法将被调用。 IIOReadUpdateListener 对象可能在读取过程中的其他时间更新，因为像素已解码。最后， IIOReadWarningListener 对象将接收有关在解码期间发生的任何非致命警告的通知。

trans-unit.source: Any registered IIOReadProgressListener objects will be notified by calling their thumbnailStarted, thumbnailProgress, and thumbnailComplete methods.
trans-unit.target: 任何已注册的 IIOReadProgressListener 对象都将通过调用它们的 thumbnailStarted ， thumbnailProgress 和 thumbnailComplete 方法得到通知。

trans-unit.source: Any registered readUpdateListeners are ignored, as there is no BufferedImage, but all other listeners are called exactly as they are for the read method.
trans-unit.target: 因为没有 BufferedImage ，所以将忽略所有已注册的 readUpdateListener ，但所有其他侦听器的调用方式都与 read 方法完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Any remaining unresolved fields are cross-checked against any date and/or time that was resolved. Thus, an earlier stage would resolve (year + month + day-of-month) to a date, and this stage would check that day-of-week was valid for the date.
trans-unit.target: 任何剩余的未解决的字段都会与已解决的日期和/或时间进行交叉检查。因此,较早的阶段会将(年+月+月日)解析为一个日期,而这个阶段会检查周日对日期是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Any sequence of letters not specified above, unrecognized letter or reserved character will throw an exception. Future versions may add to the set of patterns. It is recommended to use single quotes around all characters that you want to output directly to ensure that future changes do not break your application.
trans-unit.target: 任何未在上面指定的字母序列、未识别的字母或保留的字符都将抛出一个异常。未来的版本可能会对该模式集进行添加。建议在所有要直接输出的字符周围使用单引号,以确保未来的更改不会破坏你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Any string that conforms to these two rules is a valid path name.
trans-unit.target: 任何符合这两条规则的字符串都是有效的路径名。

trans-unit.source: Any thread currently blocked in receive(java.net.DatagramPacket) upon this socket will throw a SocketException.
trans-unit.target: 当前在此套接字上在 receive(java.net.DatagramPacket) 中阻塞的任何线程都将抛出 SocketException 。

trans-unit.source: Any thread currently blocked in an I/O operation upon this channel will receive an AsynchronousCloseException.
trans-unit.target: 当前在此通道上的I / O操作中阻塞的任何线程都将收到 AsynchronousCloseException 。

trans-unit.source: Any thread currently blocked in an I/O operation upon this socket will throw a SocketException.
trans-unit.target: 当前在此套接字上的I / O操作中阻塞的任何线程都将抛出 SocketException 。

trans-unit.source: Any uncancelled keys still associated with this selector are invalidated, their channels are deregistered, and any other resources associated with this selector are released.
trans-unit.target: 任何仍与该选择器相关联的未取消的键都无效,其通道被取消注册,与该选择器相关联的任何其他资源被释放。

trans-unit.source: Any unmatched quote is treated as closed at the end of the given pattern. For example, pattern string "'{0}" is treated as pattern "'{0}'".
trans-unit.target: 在给定模式的末尾，任何不匹配的引号将被视为封闭的。例如，模式字符串 "'{0}" 被视为模式 "'{0}'" 。

trans-unit.source: Any unrecognized letter is an error. Any non-letter character, other than '[', ']', '{', '}', '#' and the single quote will be output directly. Despite this, it is recommended to use single quotes around all characters that you want to output directly to ensure that future changes do not break your application.
trans-unit.target: 任何未被识别的字母都是错误的。除了'['、']'、'{'、'}'、'#'和单引号之外,任何非字母字符都将直接输出。尽管如此,建议在所有要直接输出的字符周围使用单引号,以确保未来的更改不会破坏你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Any unsupported key read from the keytab is ignored and not included in the result.
trans-unit.target: 从keytab读取的任何不支持的键都会被忽略,并且不包括在结果中。

trans-unit.source: Any word that matches EST, CST, MST, or PST, ignoring case, is recognized as referring to the time zone in North America that is five, six, seven, or eight hours west of Greenwich, respectively. Any word that matches EDT, CDT, MDT, or PDT, ignoring case, is recognized as referring to the same time zone, respectively, during daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 忽略大小写的任何与 EST, CST, MST 或 PST 匹配的单词都被认为是指北美格林威治以西五个小时，六个小时，七个小时或八个小时的时区。在夏令时期间，忽略大小写的任何与 EDT, CDT, MDT 或 PDT 匹配的单词都被认为分别指向相同的时区。

trans-unit.source: Any word that matches GMT, UT, or UTC, ignoring case, is treated as referring to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 忽略大小写的任何与 GMT, UT 或 UTC 匹配的单词都被视为引用UTC。

trans-unit.source: Any word that matches any prefix of SUNDAY, MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY, or SATURDAY, ignoring case, is ignored. For example, sat, Friday, TUE, and Thurs are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 忽略大小写的任何与 SUNDAY, MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY 或 SATURDAY 的前缀匹配的单词都将被忽略。例如， sat, Friday, TUE 和 Thurs 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Apart from the checking of type descriptors, a method handle's capability to call its underlying method is unrestricted. If a method handle is formed on a non-public method by a class that has access to that method, the resulting handle can be used in any place by any caller who receives a reference to it.
trans-unit.target: 除了检查类型描述符之外,方法句柄调用其底层方法的能力是不受限制的。如果一个方法句柄是由一个可以访问该方法的类在一个非公共方法上形成的,那么由此产生的句柄可以被任何收到引用的调用者在任何地方使用。

If the output is an ImageOutputStream, its existing contents prior to the current seek position are not affected, and need not be readable or writable.

trans-unit.source: Appends all of the elements in the specified Collection to the end of this Vector, in the order that they are returned by the specified Collection's Iterator. The behavior of this operation is undefined if the specified Collection is modified while the operation is in progress. (This implies that the behavior of this call is undefined if the specified Collection is this Vector, and this Vector is nonempty.)
trans-unit.target: 按照指定的集合的迭代器返回的顺序,将指定的集合中的所有元素加到这个向量的末尾。如果指定的集合在操作过程中被修改,那么这个操作的行为是未定义的。这意味着,如果指定的Collection是这个Vector,并且这个Vector是非空的,那么这个调用的行为是未定义的)。

trans-unit.source: Appends all of the elements in the specified collection that are not already contained in this list, to the end of this list, in the order that they are returned by the specified collection's iterator.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定集合的迭代器返回的顺序,将指定集合中所有尚未包含在这个列表中的元素添加到这个列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Appends all of the elements in the specified collection to the end of this deque, in the order that they are returned by the specified collection's iterator. Attempts to addAll of a deque to itself result in IllegalArgumentException.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定集合的​​迭代器返回的顺序，将指定集合中的所有元素追加到此双端队列的末尾。尝试将 addAll 双端队列添加到自身会导致 IllegalArgumentException 。

The behavior of this operation is undefined if the specified collection is modified while the operation is in progress. trans-unit.target: 使用最佳的时区ID将时区ID(如 "Europe/Paris "或 "+02:00")添加到formatter中。

trans-unit.source: Appends the time-zone ID, such as 'Europe/Paris' or '+02:00', to the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 将时区ID,如'Europe/Paris'或'+02:00',添加到格式器中。

trans-unit.source: Appends the time-zone name, such as 'British Summer Time', to the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 将时区名称(如 "英国夏令时")添加到格式器中。

trans-unit.source: Appends the time-zone region ID, such as 'Europe/Paris', to the formatter, rejecting the zone ID if it is a ZoneOffset.
trans-unit.target: 将时区区域ID（例如“ Europe / Paris”）追加到格式化程序，如果它是 ZoneOffset ，则拒绝该区域ID 。

trans-unit.source: Appends the value of a date-time field to the formatter providing full control over formatting.
trans-unit.target: 将日期-时间字段的值添加到格式器中,提供对格式的完全控制。

trans-unit.source: Appends the value of a date-time field to the formatter using a fixed width, zero-padded approach.
trans-unit.target: 使用固定宽度、零填充的方法将日期-时间字段的值添加到格式器中。

trans-unit.source: Appends the value of a date-time field to the formatter using a normal output style.
trans-unit.target: 使用普通的输出样式将日期-时间字段的值添加到格式器中。

trans-unit.source: Appends the zone offset, such as '+01:00', to the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 将区域偏移量(如'+01:00')添加到格式器中。

trans-unit.source: Application Data - Once the communication parameters have been established and the handshake is complete, application data may flow through the SSLEngine. Outbound application messages are encrypted and integrity protected, and inbound messages reverse the process.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序数据-建立通信参数并完成握手后，应用程序数据可能会流经 SSLEngine 。出站应用程序消息经过加密和完整性保护，而入站消息则逆转该过程。

trans-unit.source: Application Resource Files
trans-unit.target: 应用资源文件

trans-unit.source: Application code can also create a new MBean Server, or access already-created MBean Servers, using the MBeanServerFactory class.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码还可以使用 MBeanServerFactory 类创建新的MBean服务器，或访问已创建的MBean服务器。

trans-unit.source: Application code can directly subclass Configuration to provide a custom implementation. In addition, an instance of a Configuration object can be constructed by invoking one of the getInstance factory methods with a standard type. The default policy type is "JavaLoginConfig". See the Configuration section in the Java Cryptography Architecture Standard Algorithm Name Documentation for a list of standard Configuration types.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码可以直接将Configuration子类化以提供自定义实现。另外，可以通过调用标准类型的 getInstance 工厂方法之一来构造Configuration对象的实例。默认策略类型为“ JavaLoginConfig”。有关标准配置类型的列表，请参见Java密码体系结构标准算法名称文档中的“配置”部分。

trans-unit.source: Application code can directly subclass Policy to provide a custom implementation. In addition, an instance of a Policy object can be constructed by invoking one of the getInstance factory methods with a standard type. The default policy type is "JavaPolicy".
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码可以直接将Policy子类化以提供自定义实现。此外，可以通过调用标准类型的 getInstance 工厂方法之一来构造Policy对象的实例。默认策略类型为“ JavaPolicy”。

trans-unit.source: Application data (also known as plaintext or cleartext) is data which is produced or consumed by an application. Its counterpart is network data, which consists of either handshaking and/or ciphertext (encrypted) data, and destined to be transported via an I/O mechanism. Inbound data is data which has been received from the peer, and outbound data is destined for the peer.
trans-unit.target: 应用数据(也称为明文或清文)是由应用程序产生或消耗的数据。与之相对应的是网络数据,它由握手和/或密文(加密)数据组成,注定要通过I/O机制进行传输。入站数据是指从对等体接收的数据,出站数据是为对等体准备的。

trans-unit.source: Application developers should refer to their provider's documentation to find out which key specifications are supported by the generateSecret and getKeySpec methods. For example, the DES secret-key factory supplied by the "SunJCE" provider supports DESKeySpec as a transparent representation of DES keys, and that provider's secret-key factory for Triple DES keys supports DESedeKeySpec as a transparent representation of Triple DES keys.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序开发人员应参考其提供商的文档，以找出 generateSecret 和 getKeySpec 方法支持哪些关键规范。例如，“ SunJCE”提供程序提供的DES密钥工厂支持 DESKeySpec 作为DES密钥的透明表示，而该提供程序的Triple DES密钥的秘密工厂支持 DESedeKeySpec 作为Triple DES密钥的透明表示。

trans-unit.source: Application servers are not required to support any particular form or type of mapped name, nor the ability to use mapped names. The mapped name is product-dependent and often installation-dependent. No use of a mapped name is portable.
trans-unit.target: 应用服务器不需要支持任何特定形式或类型的映射名,也不需要使用映射名的能力。映射名依赖于产品,通常依赖于安装。映射名的使用是不可移植的。

trans-unit.source: Application-specified source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 应用指定的随机性来源。

trans-unit.source: Applications are discouraged from calling this method since this operation may not be supported by all policy implementations. Applications should rely on the implies method to perform policy checks.
trans-unit.target: 不鼓励应用程序调用此方法，因为并非所有策略实现都支持此操作。应用程序应依靠 implies 方法执行策略检查。

trans-unit.source: Applications are discouraged from calling this method since this operation may not be supported by all policy implementations. Applications should solely rely on the implies method to perform policy checks. If an application absolutely must call a getPermissions method, it should call getPermissions(ProtectionDomain).
trans-unit.target: 不鼓励应用程序调用此方法，因为并非所有策略实现都支持此操作。应用程序应仅依靠 implies 方法执行策略检查。如果应用程序绝对必须调用getPermissions方法，则应调用 getPermissions(ProtectionDomain) 。

trans-unit.source: Applications can override this method in subclasses of ThreadGroup to provide alternative handling of uncaught exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以在 ThreadGroup 的子类中重写此方法，以提供未捕获异常的替代处理。

trans-unit.source: Applications can specify ResourceBundle.Control instances returned by the getControl factory methods or created from a subclass of ResourceBundle.Control to customize the bundle loading process. The following are examples of changing the default bundle loading process.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以指定 getControl 工厂方法返回的或从 ResourceBundle.Control 的子类创建的 ResourceBundle.Control 实例，以自定义捆绑包加载过程。以下是更改默认捆绑软件加载过程的示例。

trans-unit.source: Applications can subclass this class to indicate similar exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以将该类子类化,以表示类似的异常。

trans-unit.source: Applications can use a StreamPrintService obtained from a factory in place of a PrintService which represents a physical printer device.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用从工厂获得的 StreamPrintService 代替代表物理打印机设备的 PrintService 。

trans-unit.source: Applications implement subclasses of ClassLoader in order to extend the manner in which the Java virtual machine dynamically loads classes.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序实现 ClassLoader 的子类，以扩展Java虚拟机动态加载类的方式。

trans-unit.source: Applications locate instances of this class by calling the lookupStreamPrintServiceFactories(DocFlavor, String) method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通过调用 lookupStreamPrintServiceFactories(DocFlavor, String) 方法来定位此类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Applications may override any default GUIs and provide their own controllers embedded in their own framework. All that is required is that theactivate method behave modally (not returning until either cancelled or committed), though it need not put up an explicitly modal dialog. Such a non-modal GUI component would be coded roughly as follows:
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以覆盖任何默认的GUI，并在其自己的框架中嵌入自己的控制器。所需要做的就是，尽管不需要建立一个显式的模态对话框，但是 activate 方法的行为是模态的（直到取消或提交后才返回）。这样的非模式GUI组件将大致编码如下：

trans-unit.source: Applications might choose to process delegated tasks in different threads. When an SSLEngine is created, the current AccessControlContext is saved. All future delegated tasks will be processed using this context: that is, all access control decisions will be made using the context captured at engine creation.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可能选择在不同的线程中处理委派的任务。当 SSLEngine 的创建，当前 AccessControlContext 被保存。将来所有委托的任务都将使用此上下文进行处理：也就是说，所有访问控制决策都将使用在引擎创建时捕获的上下文来做出。

trans-unit.source: Applications or applets that use an exemption mechanism may be granted stronger encryption capabilities than those which don't.
trans-unit.target: 使用豁免机制的应用程序或小程序可能会被授予比不使用豁免机制的应用程序或小程序更强的加密功能。

trans-unit.source: Applications should normally obtain an instance from ZoneRules. This factory is only intended for use when creating ZoneRules.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常应从 ZoneRules 获取实例。该工厂仅在创建 ZoneRules 时使用。

trans-unit.source: Applications should not create their own file descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不应创建自己的文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: Applications should not normally invoke this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序一般不应直接调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: Applications should throw instances of this class to indicate other illegal uses of the null object. NullPointerException objects may be constructed by the virtual machine as if suppression were disabled and/or the stack trace was not writable.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应抛出此类的实例，以指示对 null 对象的其他非法使用。虚拟机可以构造 NullPointerException 对象，就像禁用抑制和/或堆栈跟踪不可写一样。

trans-unit.source: Applications that need to define a subclass of InputStream must always provide a method that returns the next byte of input.
trans-unit.target: 需要定义 InputStream 的子类的应用程序必须始终提供一种返回输入的下一个字节的方法。

trans-unit.source: Applications that need to define a subclass of OutputStream must always provide at least a method that writes one byte of output.
trans-unit.target: 需要定义 OutputStream 子类的应用程序必须始终至少提供一种写入一个字节输出的方法。

trans-unit.source: Applications that override the clone method can also throw this exception to indicate that an object could not or should not be cloned.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖 clone 方法的应用程序也可能引发此异常，以指示无法或不应克隆对象。

trans-unit.source: Applications that want a stricter policy should override this method. If this method is overridden, the method that overrides it should additionally check to see if the calling thread has the RuntimePermission("modifyThread") permission, and if so, return silently. This is to ensure that code granted that permission (such as the JDK itself) is allowed to manipulate any thread.
trans-unit.target: 需要更严格策略的应用程序应重写此方法。如果重写此方法，则重写它的方法还应该检查调用线程是否具有 RuntimePermission("modifyThread") 权限，如果有，则静默返回。这是为了确保授予该权限的代码（例如JDK本身）被允许操纵任何线程。

trans-unit.source: Applications that want a stricter policy should override this method. If this method is overridden, the method that overrides it should additionally check to see if the calling thread has the RuntimePermission("modifyThreadGroup") permission, and if so, return silently. This is to ensure that code granted that permission (such as the JDK itself) is allowed to manipulate any thread.
trans-unit.target: 需要更严格策略的应用程序应重写此方法。如果重写了此方法，则重写该方法的方法还应该检查调用线程是否具有 RuntimePermission("modifyThreadGroup") 权限，如果有，则静默返回。这是为了确保授予该权限的代码（例如JDK本身）被允许操纵任何线程。

trans-unit.source: Applications use only the static methods of this abstract class. The instance methods are implemented by a service provider in a subclass and the unification of the results from all installed lookup classes are reported by the static methods of this class when called by the application.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序只使用这个抽象类的静态方法。实例方法由服务提供者在子类中实现,当应用程序调用该类的静态方法时,所有安装的查找类的结果统一由该类的静态方法报告。

trans-unit.source: Applications use this class by overriding getPasswordAuthentication() in a sub-class. This method will typically use the various getXXX() accessor methods to get information about the entity requesting authentication. It must then acquire a username and password either by interacting with the user or through some other non-interactive means. The credentials are then returned as a PasswordAuthentication return value.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通过重写子类中的 getPasswordAuthentication() 来使用此类。此方法通常将使用各种getXXX（）访问器方法来获取有关请求身份验证的实体的信息。然后，它必须通过与用户交互或通过其他一些非交互方式来获取用户名和密码。然后，将凭据作为 PasswordAuthentication 返回值返回。

trans-unit.source: Applications using this factory method are providing hints for an internal session reuse strategy.
trans-unit.target: 使用该工厂方法的应用程序正在为内部会话重用策略提供提示。

trans-unit.source: Applications using this factory method are providing no hints for an internal session reuse strategy. If hints are desired, createSSLEngine(String, int) should be used instead.

trans-unit.source: Arranges to asynchronously execute this task in the pool the current task is running in, if applicable, or using the ForkJoinPool.commonPool() if not inForkJoinPool(). While it is not necessarily enforced, it is a usage error to fork a task more than once unless it has completed and been reinitialized. Subsequent modifications to the state of this task or any data it operates on are not necessarily consistently observable by any thread other than the one executing it unless preceded by a call to join() or related methods, or a call to isDone() returning true.
trans-unit.target: 安排在当前任务正在运行的池中异步执行此任务（如果适用），或者如果不是 inForkJoinPool() 则使用 ForkJoinPool.commonPool() （）。尽管不一定要强制执行它，但如果任务已完成并重新初始化，则多次分叉任务是使用错误。除非对 join() 或相关方法的调用或对 isDone() 的调用返回 true ，否则对该任务的状态或对其进行操作的任何数据的后续修改都不一定可由执行该线程的线程以外的任何线程一致地观察到。。
